nodes.text: Scythis was a IPV-1 System Patrol Craft used by the Galactic Empire during the Galactic Civil War.

At some point the Scythis inspected a suspected Rebel arms cache protected by a minefield, with the help of an Assault Gunboat. Once the mines were cleared the Gunboat inspected the Class-D cargo container to find it had a hanger and a Delta-class DX-9 stormtrooper transport Weet carrying Rebel spies was launched. The transport was disabled and the patrol craft carrying stormtroopers boarded and captured the transport.
The mission was recorded and recreated for the Combat chamber to train future pilots such as Maarek Stele.
